item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: In addition to all the default Hugo shortcodes, Congo adds a few extras for additional functionality. Alert # alert outputs its contents as a stylised message box within your article. It’s useful for drawing attention to important information that you don’t want the reader to miss. The input is written in Markdown so you can format it however you please. Example: {{< alert >}} **Warning!** This action is destructive! {{< /alert >}} Warning!

item.title: Rich Content
item.description:
Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
